title: Bug 16244NPE when changing pages in preference dialog
description: Bug 16244NPE when changing pages in preference dialog
OB: nightly build 0517, likely happens on all platforms open the preferences dialog click on any toplevel preference page tree item (eg. Java) and get theattached exception the exception does not occur if preference pages in the tree are traversedusing the arrow keys instead of the mouse
EB: Java) and get theattached exception the exception does not occur if preference pages in the tree are traversedusing the arrow keys instead of the mouse
